title: Before the Beginning and After the End: On Narrative and Belief with Benjamin Boyce
description:
A number of months ago @Benjamin A Boyce released a video entitled "What I Believe"...I had some questions and he was kind enough to oblige

Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Before-the-Beginning-and-After-the-End-On-Narrative-and-Belief-with-Benjamin-Boyce-ev8la6

Benjamin's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cqtDwWnNYtI&t=207s

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com 
follow my me on Instagram @vintage_bangs
